text: @KirstieMAllsopp @BBCNewsnight I really quite appreciate your views usually. But you've totally missed the point on this one @KirstieMAllsopp. The problem here is that it isn't just children in a school. There are many adults and some of them are worried about the effect on them and their loved ones. #COVID19
